data.title: Erik Velderman - Director Corporate Development at TKH Group
data.meta_description: Erik Velderman has extensive experience in various leadership roles in finance and corporate development.
data.text:
Erik Velderman has extensive experience in various leadership roles in finance and corporate development. Erik served as the CEO of TKH Airport Solutions and FC Twente, as well as the Director of Corporate Development at TKH Group N.V. Prior to this, they held CFO positions at VolkerWessels Telecom, NedTrain, and Nuon. Erik also worked in finance and M&A roles at Nederlandse Spoorwegen, Nuon, Arcadis, and PwC.

Erik Velderman completed their International Baccalaureate (bilingual) at Washington International School in 1985. Erik then went on to earn a Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com. Hnrs) in Accounting and Finance from Queen's University in 1989. Finally, they obtained an MBA from Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University in 1991.
